subject: Football
College Athletics
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: Opponents have long accepted the Notre Dame credo: Too sainted to play in your conference, too special to step into your house if it does not meet our dimensional specifications. But not anymore.
snippet: Opponents have long accepted the Notre Dame credo: Too sainted to play in your conference, too special to step into your house if it does not meet our dimensional specifications. But not anymore.
